projects.title: Foetal Head Segmentation in Ultrasound Scans
projects.bodyText:
- CNN based Foetal Head Segmentation
 -  Segnet and UNet Architectures
 - Optimized GPU efficiency and Dice Score - 0.90

projects.title: Sports Celebrity Image Classification
projects.bodyText:
- Image classification system using **OpenCV** and **Haar Cascades**.
- Achieved **91%** accuracy with an F1 score of **0.88**

projects.title: Deep Learning-Based Stock Price Forecasting
projects.bodyText:
- Sequential **TensorFlow** model with **LSTM** layers to forecast stock prices using **Yahoo Finance API** data.
- Reduced RMSE loss to **235** with preprocessing and optimization.

projects.title: Excel QA Chatbot
projects.bodyText:
- A **Streamlit App** that allows users to upload XLSX, XLS file and recieve answers using opensource LLMs.
 - Can find relationship between **textual** and **non textual** data columns.
 - Uses AI21 **Jamba 1.5** model for inference.
 - **ChromaDB** for vector storage.
